hero.subtitle: Stop guessing where your revenue comes from. Traaaction gives you precision attribution, automated payouts, and real-time fraud prevention.

features.title: Everything you need to scale
features.subtitle: Powerful tools for startups and sellers

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Stop flying blind. Access powerful, actionable insights to guide your growth.

madeForYou.title: Made for you
madeForYou.description: Generate tracked links for e-stores, launch referral programs, or use pay-per-lead.

chooseSellers.title: Choose your Sellers
chooseSellers.description: Public, private, or invite-only: You decide exactly who represents your brand.

b2b.title: Cut through the noise
b2b.subtitle: Our platform gives partner startups a complete dashboard to track and truly control their Traaaction.

connectionDomains.title: Connection domains
connectionDomains.description: Bypass ad-blockers and ensure every click is counted with our advanced link infrastructure.

crossBorder.title: Cross-border Expansion
crossBorder.description: Scale across Europe. Select and manage local experts in France, Germany, or Spain directly.

globalPayouts.title: Global Payouts
globalPayouts.description: Pay all your partners instantly and simultaneously, anywhere in the world.

sellers.title: Built for Sellers
sellers.subtitle: Everything you need to monetize your network

certifiedAnalytics.title: Certified Analytics
certifiedAnalytics.description: Your sales performance is tracked, verified, and can serve as proof of skill for your CV.

networking.title: Direct Networking
networking.description: Connect directly with startups looking for sales talent like you.

smartPayouts.title: Smart Payouts
smartPayouts.description: Your earnings, your choice. Withdraw via Stripe, store funds in your Traaaction Wallet, or convert them into gift cards.

sellerSteps.title: Start earning quickly
sellerSteps.subtitle: Join the platform, pick a mission, and start generating revenue. No complex onboarding, just

step1.title: Create & Validate
step1.description: Sign up and complete your profile identification. Get verified instantly to access opportunities.

step2.title: Join & Claim Link
step2.description: Browse active missions from top brands. Accept a mission and get your unique tracking link.

step3.title: Sell & Earn
step3.description: Share your link and track sales in real-time. Receive automated payouts directly to your account.

globe.title: Evolving with you
globe.subtitle: We are committed to growing alongside startups and sellers. Our platform is built to
globe.subtitleEnd: , ensuring we evolve together via a transparent, boundless ecosystem.

lucas.quote: In the era of AI, we believe skills will be valued through experience rather than degrees or certifications. Traaaction aims to become a truly reliable source for our sellers' skills, which will eventually be rightfully recognized on a professional CV.
lucas.name: Lucas Roncey

kate.quote: Traaaction is solving a major painpoint in Europe and in the rest of the world: start-ups need sales traction to raise money. Young professionals are keen to work on sales missions to kick-off their careers and generate revenue. Traaaction is there to connect start-ups and young professionals for the best!
kate.name: Kate B. Masson

whatIs.question: What is traaaction.com?
whatIs.answer: Traaaction connects growing startups with salespeople, influencers, and UGC creators. Startups choose who they want to work with, and sellers are paid on commission for every sale they generate. Simple as that.

whoFor.question: Who is traaaction.com for?
whoFor.answer: We cater to B2B and B2C startups in growth phase needing fast results, as well as independent sellers, students, and business finders wishing to generate extra income or build a career in sales.

isFree.question: Is traaaction.com free?
isFree.answer: Yes, traaaction.com offers no paid features. We are remunerated solely on commission, at a rate of 15% per sale generated.

customDomain.question: Can I use my own domain name?
customDomain.answer: Absolutely. Credibility is key in sales. You can connect your own domain name so that all your tracking links and sales pages perfectly reflect your brand or personal identity.

linkPerformance.question: Can I view my link performance?
linkPerformance.answer: Yes, our 'Certified Analytics' dashboard offers you a detailed, real-time view of every click, lead, and sale generated. This data is certified and can even serve as proof of skill for your CV.

contact.question: How can I contact you if I have a question?
contact.answer: Our support team is available directly via the platform chat or by email. We also have an active community of sellers and founders ready to help and share best practices.

missionSelector.title: One platform, two ways to grow.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We're building the bridge between startups that need traction and sales talent ready to deliver it.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Startups need sales traction to grow and raise funding. Young professionals are eager to kickstart their careers and generate revenue. {highlight}
mission.p2: We're democratizing affiliate marketing by making it accessible, transparent, and performance-driven. No upfront costs for startups, no barriers for sellers.
mission.p3: In a world where skills matter more than degrees, we believe sales talent should be valued through real results. Traaaction provides the tools to prove it.
mission.p4: Our platform handles everything from tracking and attribution to commission calculations and payouts — so both sides can focus on what they do best.

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Define your affiliate program: commission type, rates, and target audience. Go live in minutes.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Sellers browse the marketplace, join missions, and share tracked links with their audience.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Every click, lead, and sale is tracked. Sellers earn commissions automatically.

values.title: Our Values
values.transparencyDesc: Clear commission structures, real-time tracking, and full visibility for both startups and sellers.
values.performanceDesc: Pay for results, not promises. Every commission is tied to a real, measurable action.
values.simplicityDesc: Easy onboarding, intuitive dashboards, and tools that get out of your way.
values.trustDesc: Secure payments via Stripe, fraud detection, and a 30-day hold period for peace of mind.

team.title: The Team
team.subtitle: The people behind Traaaction, committed to making affiliate marketing work for everyone.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a startup looking for traction or a seller ready to earn, we'd love to hear from you.

sellerTerms.title: Seller
sellerTerms.subtitle: These terms govern your participation as a Seller (affiliate) on the Traaaction platform. Please read them carefully before joining any program.
sellerTerms.intro: These Seller Terms ("Seller Terms") supplement the general Terms of Service and apply specifically to users who register as Sellers on Traaaction. In case of conflict, these Seller Terms prevail for seller-related matters.

startupTerms.title: Startup
startupTerms.subtitle: These terms govern your use of Traaaction as a Startup creating and managing affiliate programs. They define your obligations toward Sellers and the platform.
startupTerms.intro: These Startup Terms ("Startup Terms") supplement the general Terms of Service and apply specifically to users who register as Startups on Traaaction. In case of conflict, these Startup Terms prevail for startup-related matters.

hero.title: Startup
hero.subtitle: These terms govern your use of Traaaction as a Startup creating and managing affiliate programs. They define your obligations toward Sellers and the platform.

startupTermsPage.intro: These Startup Terms ("Startup Terms") supplement the general <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> and apply specifically to users who register as Startups on Traaaction. In case of conflict, these Startup Terms prevail for startup-related matters.

eligibility.intro: To use Traaaction as a Startup, you must:

items.0: Be a legally registered business entity or sole proprietorship
items.1: Provide accurate company information (name, address, registration number if applicable)
items.2: Create a Workspace with a unique slug identifier
items.3: Designate at least one Workspace Owner with full administrative rights
items.4: Have a functioning website or application where the Traaaction tracking SDK will be installed

eligibility.infoCardText: Upon workspace creation, you receive a public key (pk_*) for client-side tracking and a secret key (trac_live_*) for server-side operations. Secret keys are hashed and cannot be recovered — store them securely.

obligations.intro: As a Startup using Traaaction, you commit to:

items.0: Provide accurate and truthful descriptions of your products and services
items.1: Set fair and sustainable commission rates that you can honor
items.2: Not retroactively reduce commission rates for already-generated conversions
items.3: Clearly communicate program rules, restrictions, and approved promotion methods
items.4: Respond to Seller inquiries within a reasonable timeframe

items.0: Pay all approved commissions within the timeframe defined by these terms
items.1: Maintain sufficient funds to cover earned commissions
items.2: Pay the 15% platform fee on all transactions processed through Traaaction
items.3: Not dispute legitimate commissions without valid grounds (refund, fraud, chargeback)

items.0: Comply with all applicable e-commerce, consumer protection, and advertising laws
items.1: Include required affiliate disclosure notices on your website
items.2: Install the Traaaction tracking SDK in accordance with privacy regulations (GDPR cookie consent)
items.3: Inform your customers that affiliate tracking is in use through your privacy policy
items.4: Process refunds fairly and in accordance with your published refund policy

programs.intro: When creating and managing affiliate programs (Missions) on Traaaction:

items.0: Define clear reward type: Sale, Lead, or Recurring
items.1: Set commission structure: Flat rate or Percentage
items.2: Choose visibility: Public, Private, or Invite-Only
items.3: Provide marketing materials and content for Sellers

items.0: Commission rate changes apply only to future conversions
items.1: Program archival requires 30 days notice to active Sellers
items.2: You must honor pending commissions after program closure
items.3: Seller removal requires valid justification

programs.infoCardText: Programs can be DRAFT (not visible), ACTIVE (accepting sellers), or ARCHIVED (no new enrollments, existing commissions still honored).

0.calculation: Of net amount (after Stripe fees + taxes)

steps.0: Commissions mature after the hold period (3 days for leads, 30 days for sales)
steps.1: Matured commissions appear as "unpaid" in your dashboard
steps.2: You select commissions to pay and initiate a batch payment via Stripe Checkout
steps.3: Payment includes Seller commissions + 15% platform fee
steps.4: Upon confirmation, commissions are distributed to Sellers automatically

fees.latePaymentText: Failure to pay matured commissions within 30 days may result in account suspension, loss of access to the platform, and Sellers being notified of the payment delay. Persistent non-payment may lead to legal action.

commissions.intro: You are responsible for ensuring fair commission practices:

items.0: Commission rates set in a program are binding for all conversions generated under those rates
items.1: Refunds must be processed through the original payment method; Traaaction will automatically claw back affected commissions
items.2: Chargebacks trigger automatic commission reversal — you are responsible for managing disputes with your payment processor
items.3: You may not artificially delay or block legitimate conversions to avoid paying commissions
items.4: Batch payouts can only be initiated for commissions with status PROCEED (fully matured)

commissions.infoCardText: If you dispute a commission, you must provide evidence (refund receipt, chargeback notice, fraud documentation) within 7 days. Undisputed commissions after hold period are final.

tracking.intro: Traaaction provides tracking infrastructure. Your responsibilities:

items.0: Install and maintain the Traaaction tracking SDK (trac.js) correctly on your website
items.1: Not interfere with, block, or manipulate tracking cookies or attribution data
items.2: Configure Stripe webhooks correctly for automatic sale attribution
items.3: Report any tracking issues promptly so they can be resolved
items.4: Maintain proper GDPR consent mechanisms for tracking cookies on your website

attributionModel.title: Attribution Model
attributionModel.description: Traaaction uses a first-click attribution model with a 90-day cookie window:

items.0: The first Seller to generate a click for a customer receives attribution
items.1: Attribution is locked to the customer record and cannot be overwritten by subsequent clicks
items.2: Cookie window is 90 days from the initial click
items.3: If the cookie expires, the customer can be re-attributed to a new Seller

sellers.intro: You have control over which Sellers participate in your programs:

items.0: You may set program visibility to Public (open enrollment), Private (approval required), or Invite-Only
items.1: You may approve or reject Seller applications based on legitimate criteria
items.2: You may remove a Seller from your program with valid justification
items.3: You may not discriminate against Sellers based on protected characteristics
items.4: Communication with Sellers must be professional and through the platform messaging system

sellers.infoCardText: When removing a Seller, all pending commissions must still be honored. The Seller's existing tracking links will be deactivated. You must provide a reason for removal upon request.

prohibited.intro: As a Startup, the following are strictly prohibited:

0.title: Commission manipulation
0.desc: Artificially reducing conversion rates, blocking valid attributions, or rejecting legitimate commissions

1.title: Deceptive programs
1.desc: Creating programs with unrealistic commission rates to attract Sellers with no intent to pay

2.title: Data misuse
2.desc: Using Seller contact information for purposes outside the platform relationship

3.title: Retroactive changes
3.desc: Modifying commission rates to apply to already-generated conversions

4.title: Payment avoidance
4.desc: Closing workspace or archiving programs to avoid paying earned commissions

5.title: Webhook tampering
5.desc: Modifying, delaying, or blocking Stripe webhook events to prevent commission creation

items.0: You may close your Workspace at any time through settings
items.1: All matured (PROCEED) and pending (PENDING) commissions must be paid before closure is finalized
items.2: Active Sellers will be notified 30 days before program closure
items.3: Tracking links will be deactivated upon workspace closure

items.0: Immediate suspension for fraud, non-payment, or serious policy violations
items.1: Account termination with 30 days notice for repeated minor violations
items.2: In case of suspension, unpaid commissions remain a financial obligation

termination.infoCardText: Payment obligations survive termination. Traaaction reserves the right to pursue unpaid commissions through legal means, including debt collection and court proceedings under French law.

items.0: Traaaction provides tracking and payment infrastructure "as is" without guarantee of uninterrupted service
items.1: Traaaction is not liable for Seller actions, including misleading promotion or policy violations
items.2: Traaaction is not liable for conversion loss due to ad blockers, cookie restrictions, or browser privacy features
items.3: You indemnify Traaaction against claims arising from your products, services, or marketing practices
items.4: You indemnify Traaaction against claims from your customers related to purchases made through affiliate links

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.text: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Traaaction, its founders, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or legal fees arising from: (a) your use of the platform, (b) your products or services, (c) your violation of these terms, (d) disputes with Sellers, or (e) claims from your customers.

contact.intro: For questions about these Startup Terms:

reportAbuse.title: Report
reportAbuse.subtitle: Traaaction is committed to preventing abuse and misuse of its platform. If you believe a link, user, or program is being used for malicious purposes, please report it below.
reportAbuse.whatWeConsiderDesc: Traaaction prohibits the use of its platform to create or promote malicious content, including but not limited to:
reportAbuse.helperText: Since links and programs are created by individual users, we cannot control all content. Your reports help us keep the platform safe.

form.title: Report a concern
form.emailHelper: So we can follow up on your report if needed.
form.urlHelper: The Traaaction short link, user profile, or program URL you want to report.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the abuse in detail. Include any evidence or context that will help us investigate.
form.disclaimer: All reports are reviewed by our trust & safety team. False reports may result in action against the reporter.

success.title: Report Submitted
success.description: Thank you for helping keep Traaaction safe. We will review your report and take appropriate action. You may receive a follow-up at the email address you provided.

hero.subtitle: These terms govern your participation as a Seller (affiliate) on the Traaaction platform. Please read them carefully before joining any program.

intro.text: These Seller Terms ("Seller Terms") supplement the general <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> and apply specifically to users who register as Sellers on Traaaction. In case of conflict, these Seller Terms prevail for seller-related matters.

section1.title: Eligibility & Account
section1.intro: To participate as a Seller on Traaaction, you must:

items.0: Be at least 18 years old and legally capable of entering into contracts
items.1: Provide accurate personal information (name, email, country of residence)
items.2: Complete the onboarding process including profile setup
items.3: Set up a valid payout method (Stripe Connect, PayPal, IBAN, or Platform Wallet)
items.4: Not have been previously banned from the platform

infoCard.title: Stripe Connect:
infoCard.text: To receive direct payouts, you must complete Stripe's identity verification (KYC). Until verified, earnings accumulate in your Platform Wallet and can only be redeemed as gift cards.

section2.title: Seller Obligations
section2.intro: As a Seller, you commit to the following:

items.0: Promote products and services honestly and transparently
items.1: Always disclose your affiliate relationship as required by law (FTC, GDPR, EU Directive 2005/29/EC)
items.2: Never make false, misleading, or exaggerated claims about products you promote
items.3: Use only approved marketing materials and messaging provided by the Startup
items.4: Respect each program's specific guidelines and restrictions

items.0: Comply with all applicable laws in your country of residence and your audience's jurisdictions
items.1: Declare affiliate income to your tax authorities as required
items.2: Obtain necessary business licenses or registrations if applicable
items.3: Respect GDPR and data protection laws when collecting or processing user data

items.0: Do not associate promoted products with illegal, adult, violent, or hateful content
items.1: Do not use trademarked terms in domain names or paid ad keywords without written permission
items.2: Do not create fake reviews, testimonials, or endorsements

section3.title: Commissions & Payouts
section3.intro: Commission rules are defined by each Startup program you join:

0.desc: Earned when a referred customer completes a purchase
0.example: Flat rate (e.g., €5/sale) or percentage of net sale amount

1.desc: Earned when a referred visitor completes a qualifying action (signup, form, etc.)

2.desc: Earned on subscription renewals from referred customers

walletInfo.title: Wallet limitation:
walletInfo.text: Funds in your Platform Wallet can only be redeemed as gift cards (Amazon, iTunes, Steam, PayPal Gift). Wallet balances are not transferable to Stripe Connect or bank accounts.

section4.title: Hold Periods & Clawbacks
section4.intro: Commissions are subject to hold periods before becoming payable:

clawback.title: Clawback Policy
clawback.intro: Commissions may be revoked ("clawed back") in the following situations:

items.0: The referred customer requests a refund within the hold period
items.1: A chargeback is filed against the transaction
items.2: The lead or sale is determined to be fraudulent or self-referred
items.3: The Startup cancels the program or disputes the conversion

infoCard.title: Already paid commissions:
infoCard.text: If a commission has already been paid (status COMPLETE) and a refund or fraud is later discovered, a negative balance entry will be created on your account. This balance will be deducted from future earnings.

section5.title: Prohibited Activities
section5.intro: The following activities are strictly prohibited and will result in immediate action:

0.title: Self-referrals
0.desc: Purchasing through your own affiliate links or using fake accounts to generate commissions

1.title: Click fraud
1.desc: Artificially inflating clicks through bots, scripts, click farms, or automated tools

2.title: Cookie stuffing
2.desc: Dropping affiliate cookies without genuine user intent or knowledge

3.title: Spam
3.desc: Sending unsolicited emails, messages, or bulk communications to promote affiliate links

4.title: Misleading ads
4.desc: Using deceptive ad copy, fake urgency, or misleading landing pages

5.title: Brand bidding
5.desc: Bidding on the Startup's brand name in paid search without written permission

6.title: Incentivized traffic
6.desc: Offering rewards for clicking or purchasing through your links (unless explicitly allowed)

7.title: Account sharing
7.desc: Sharing your account credentials or affiliate links with unauthorized third parties

section6.title: Fraud Detection & Monitoring
section6.intro: Traaaction employs automated and manual fraud detection systems. By using the platform, you acknowledge:

items.0: All traffic and conversions are subject to automated fraud analysis
items.1: Suspicious patterns (unusual click volumes, geographic anomalies, conversion spikes) may trigger review
items.2: Traaaction reserves the right to hold or withhold commissions pending fraud investigation
items.3: Investigations may take up to 30 days; you will be notified of the outcome
items.4: Repeat offenders will be permanently banned with forfeiture of all pending commissions

infoCard.title: Appeals:
infoCard.text: If you believe a fraud determination is incorrect, you may appeal by contacting <email>contact@traaaction.com</email> within 14 days of notification with supporting evidence.

items.0: You may close your Seller account at any time through account settings
items.1: Pending commissions in hold period will still be processed and paid after maturation
items.2: Wallet balance remains available for gift card redemption for 90 days after closure
items.3: After 90 days, unclaimed wallet balances are forfeited

items.0: Immediate suspension for suspected fraud, policy violations, or illegal activity
items.1: Account termination with 14 days notice for repeated minor violations
items.2: Account termination with 30 days notice for business reasons

items.0: All pending (PENDING) commissions are immediately forfeited
items.1: Matured (PROCEED) commissions may be withheld pending investigation
items.2: Platform Wallet balance may be frozen
items.3: Affiliate links are deactivated and will redirect to the Startup's homepage
items.4: You may not create a new account without written permission

items.0: Traaaction is not responsible for Startup program changes, including commission rate modifications or program closures
items.1: Traaaction does not guarantee any minimum level of earnings or conversions
items.2: Technical tracking issues (cookie blocking, ad blockers, browser restrictions) may affect attribution
items.3: Traaaction is not liable for payment delays caused by Stripe, PayPal, or banking systems
items.4: Traaaction's total liability is limited to the commissions earned in the 3 months preceding the claim

infoCard.title: Independent Contractor:
infoCard.text: As a Seller, you are an independent contractor, not an employee, agent, or representative of Traaaction or any Startup. You are solely responsible for your own taxes, insurance, and legal compliance.

section9.title: Contact
section9.intro: For questions about these Seller Terms:

hero.subtitle: Your privacy matters. This policy explains how Traaaction collects, uses, and protects your data with full GDPR compliance.

intro.p1: Welcome to Traaaction. We provide a platform for managing affiliate and partner marketing programs, enabling startups to create missions and sellers to earn commissions through tracked referrals.
intro.p2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in this policy.

s1.description: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

s2.description: We collect different types of information depending on how you interact with our Service:

startups.title: For Startups (Program Owners)
startups.item0: Account information: name, email address, company name

sellers.title: For Sellers (Affiliates)
sellers.item1: Profile information: bio, social media links, profile picture
sellers.item2: Payout information: Stripe Connect, PayPal, or IBAN
sellers.item3: Performance data: clicks, leads, sales, commissions

endUsers.title: For End Users (Visitors)
endUsers.description: When you click on a tracking link, we may collect:
endUsers.item1: IP address (geolocation only, not stored for EU)

s3.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to operate our Service and provide attribution tracking.

noAdCookies.title: No advertising cookies.
noAdCookies.description: Our tracking cookies are strictly first-party and used solely for affiliate attribution.

s4.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

item0.title: Service Delivery
item0.desc: To provide, operate, and maintain our platform

item1.title: Attribution
item1.desc: To track clicks, leads, and sales to correct sellers

item3.title: Analytics
item3.desc: To provide insights about affiliate programs

item6.title: Improvement
item6.desc: Analyze usage patterns to improve Service

item7.title: Legal
item7.desc: Comply with applicable laws and regulations

s5.description: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we process your personal data based on:

item0.desc: Processing necessary to provide our Service (account management, payments, tracking)

item1.desc: Fraud prevention, security, and service improvement

s6.description: We share your data with trusted service providers who help us operate our platform:

otherDisclosures.title: Other Disclosures
otherDisclosures.item0: To comply with legal obligations or lawful requests
otherDisclosures.item1: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property
otherDisclosures.item2: In connection with a merger or acquisition (with prior notice)
otherDisclosures.item3: With your consent for any other purpose

s7.description: Your data may be transferred to countries outside the EEA. We ensure appropriate safeguards:
s7.item0: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission
s7.item2: Data Processing Agreements with all subprocessors

s8.description: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary:

s9.description: If you are in the EU/EEA, you have the following rights:

item0.desc: Request a copy of your personal data

s9.contactText: To exercise these rights, contact us at
s9.contactTextEnd: . We will respond within 30 days. You may also lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.

s10.description: When you use our tracking features on your website:

controller.label: You (Startup)
controller.title: Data Controller
controller.description: Responsible for obtaining consent, informing users, and responding to privacy requests.

processor.title: Data Processor
processor.description: Processes data on your behalf according to our Data Processing Agreement.

s11.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures:
s11.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

s12.description: Our Service is not intended for individuals under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us.

s13.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we make significant changes:
s13.item0: We will post the updated policy with a new "Last updated" date
s13.item1: We will send email notification to registered users for material changes
s13.disclaimer: Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

s14.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy:

hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Traaaction. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these terms.

intro.p1: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Traaaction platform, including our website, applications, and services (collectively, the "Service").
intro.p2: Traaaction is operated by Traaaction SAS, a company registered in France. By using our Service, you enter into a binding agreement with us.

acceptance.p1_before: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our
acceptance.p1_after: If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Service.
acceptance.importantText: You must be at least 18 years old and capable of forming a binding contract to use our Service.
acceptance.p2: If you are using the Service on behalf of a company or organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that entity to these Terms.

description.intro: Traaaction is a SaaS platform that connects Startups (businesses) with Sellers (affiliates) to create and manage affiliate marketing programs. Our Service includes:

0.title: Mission Creation
0.desc: Startups create affiliate programs with customizable commission structures

1.title: Seller Marketplace
1.desc: Sellers browse and join affiliate programs that match their audience

2.title: Attribution Tracking
2.desc: Real-time tracking of clicks, leads, and sales via unique links

3.title: Commission Management
3.desc: Automated calculation and tracking of commissions

4.title: Payout Processing
4.desc: Secure payouts via Stripe Connect, PayPal, or bank transfer

5.title: Analytics Dashboard
5.desc: Comprehensive reporting for both startups and sellers

accounts.intro: To use certain features of the Service, you must create an account. When creating an account, you agree to:

items.0: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
items.1: Maintain and promptly update your account information
items.2: Keep your password secure and confidential
items.3: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
items.4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access

startup.label: Business
startup.title: Startup Account
startup.desc: For businesses creating affiliate programs and managing sellers.

seller.label: Individual
seller.title: Seller Account
seller.desc: For affiliates promoting products and earning commissions.

startups.intro: As a Startup using our platform, you agree to:

items.0: Provide accurate information about your products, services, and commission structures
items.1: Honor all commissions earned by Sellers according to your program terms
items.2: Pay platform fees and Seller commissions in a timely manner
items.3: Comply with all applicable laws regarding advertising and affiliate marketing
items.4: Not modify commission terms retroactively to disadvantage Sellers
items.5: Maintain adequate funds to cover earned commissions

startups.paymentText: You must pay all approved commissions within 30 days of the commission becoming payable. Failure to do so may result in account suspension.

sellers.intro: As a Seller using our platform, you agree to:

items.0: Promote products and services honestly and transparently
items.1: Disclose your affiliate relationship as required by law (FTC, GDPR, etc.)
items.2: Not engage in fraudulent activities such as fake clicks, leads, or self-referrals
items.3: Not use spam, misleading advertising, or deceptive practices
items.4: Comply with each program's specific terms and guidelines
items.5: Provide accurate payment information for receiving commissions

sellers.disclosureIntro: You must clearly disclose your affiliate relationship when promoting products. Example disclosures include:

disclosures.1: "I may earn a commission if you purchase through my link"

fees.intro: Traaaction charges fees for the use of our platform:
fees.note: Platform fees are calculated on the net amount after Stripe processing fees and applicable taxes.

commissions.intro: Commissions are earned based on the program terms set by each Startup:

0.desc: Percentage or flat rate per completed sale
0.example: e.g., 10% of sale or €5 per sale

1.desc: Flat rate per qualified lead or signup

0.desc: Commission created, subject to refund period

commissions.holdText: Commissions are held for 30 days (sales/recurring) or 3 days (leads) to account for refunds and chargebacks.

intellectual.intro: All intellectual property rights in the Service, including but not limited to software, design, logos, and content, are owned by Traaaction or our licensors.

items.0: You may not copy, modify, or distribute our proprietary materials
items.1: You may not reverse engineer or decompile our software
items.2: You retain ownership of content you upload to the platform
items.3: You grant us a license to use your content to provide the Service
items.4: Trademarks and logos remain the property of their respective owners

prohibited.intro: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

0.title: Fraud
0.desc: Fake clicks, leads, self-referrals, or cookie stuffing

1.title: Spam
1.desc: Unsolicited emails, messages, or automated submissions

2.title: Deception
2.desc: Misleading advertising or false claims about products

3.title: Impersonation
3.desc: Pretending to be another person or entity

4.title: Hacking
4.desc: Attempting to access systems without authorization

5.title: Abuse
5.desc: Harassing other users or disrupting the Service

prohibited.warningText: Violation of these terms may result in immediate account termination, forfeiture of commissions, and legal action.

termination.intro: Either party may terminate the agreement under the following conditions:

byYou.0: You may close your account at any time through account settings
byYou.1: Startups must pay all outstanding commissions before closure
byYou.2: Sellers will receive earned commissions after standard hold periods

byUs.0: We may suspend or terminate accounts for Terms violations
byUs.1: We may terminate with 30 days notice for any reason
byUs.2: Immediate termination for fraud, illegal activity, or abuse

termination.effectText: Upon termination, your right to use the Service ceases immediately. Provisions that should survive (payment obligations, limitations of liability) will remain in effect.

disclaimers.intro: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

items.0: We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation
items.1: We do not guarantee specific results or earnings
items.2: We are not responsible for third-party products or services
items.3: We do not endorse any Startup or Seller on the platform
items.4: Technical issues may temporarily affect tracking or payments

liability.intro: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, TRAAACTION SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR:

items.0: Indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages
items.1: Loss of profits, revenue, data, or business opportunities
items.2: Damages exceeding fees paid in the 12 months prior to the claim
items.3: Actions or omissions of other users on the platform

liability.note: Some jurisdictions do not allow limitation of liability for certain damages. In such cases, our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law.

indemnification.intro: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Traaaction and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from:

items.0: Your use of the Service or violation of these Terms
items.1: Your violation of any third-party rights
items.2: Content you submit or transmit through the Service
items.3: Your negligence or willful misconduct

changes.intro: We may modify these Terms at any time. When we make material changes:

items.0: We will post the updated Terms with a new effective date
items.1: We will notify registered users via email at least 30 days in advance
items.2: Continued use after the effective date constitutes acceptance
items.3: If you disagree with changes, you may close your account

contact.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service:

governing.p1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governing.p2: Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Brest, France.
governing.note: For EU consumers: Nothing in these Terms affects your statutory rights under applicable consumer protection laws.

sellerReferral.title: Referral Program
sellerReferral.subtitle: Invite sellers and earn a percentage of every sale they generate — for life.
sellerReferral.disclaimer: Percentages are calculated on the sale amount (HT) and funded by Traaaction — your referred sellers earn the exact same commissions.
sellerReferral.noReferrals: No referrals yet. Share your link to get started!
sellerReferral.learnMore: Learn more about the referral program

hero.subtitle: Invite sellers to Traaaction and earn up to 10% of the revenue (excl. tax) on every sale — across 3 generations, for life. Funded by Traaaction, not your referrals.

tiers.title: Up to 10% per sale
tiers.subtitle: 3 commission tiers, fully funded by Traaaction. Your referrals are never impacted.

gen1.label: Generation 1
gen1.desc: Your referral signs up via your link. You earn 5% of the revenue on every sale they make.

gen2.label: Generation 2
gen2.desc: Your referral's referral. When they sell, you earn 3% of the revenue — automatically.

gen3.label: Generation 3
gen3.desc: The 3rd generation of your network. Every sale still earns you 2% of the revenue.

example.label: Concrete example
example.title: On a €100 sale (excl. tax) by a 3rd generation seller, here's how commissions are split.
example.note: The selling seller earns the exact same commission as a non-referred seller. Only Traaaction reduces its margin to fund the program.

howItWorks.title: In 4 steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From signup to your first referral commissions.

step1.title: Sign up
step1.desc: Create your seller account and complete your profile. Your unique referral link is generated automatically.

step2.title: Share
step2.desc: Send your link to other creators, influencers or sales professionals.

step3.title: Sales
step3.desc: Your referrals join missions and generate sales for partner startups.

step4.title: Commissions
step4.desc: On every sale, your commission is calculated and credited. Visible in real time.

zeroImpact.title: Zero impact on your referrals
zeroImpact.desc: Referred sellers earn exactly the same. No disadvantage whatsoever. Everything is funded by Traaaction from its margin.

lifetime.title: Passive income for life
lifetime.desc: No time limit. As long as your referrals sell, you earn your referral commission.

generations.title: 3 generations deep
generations.desc: Not just your direct referrals: their own referrals and the next generation also earn you commissions.

automatic.title: Fully automatic
automatic.desc: No paperwork, no manual tracking. Commissions are calculated, credited and paid out automatically.

q1.q: How does the referral program work?
q1.a: Every Traaaction seller has a unique referral link. When a new seller signs up via your link and starts generating sales, you automatically receive a percentage of the revenue (excl. tax) on every transaction — for life.

q2.q: Where does the referral commission money come from?
q2.a: Referral commissions are funded by Traaaction, from our 15% platform fee. The referred seller earns exactly the same as a non-referred seller. Nothing changes for them, nor for the startup.

q3.q: How many generations can I earn from?
q3.a: Up to 3 generations. You earn 5% on your direct referrals' sales, 3% on their referrals' sales, and 2% on the 3rd generation. Maximum 10% of revenue per sale.

q4.q: When do I receive my earnings?
q4.a: Referral commissions follow the same cycle as regular commissions: a 30-day hold period (chargeback protection), then they become available for withdrawal via Stripe Connect, PayPal, or bank transfer.

q5.a: No, the referral is for life. As long as your referral generates sales on Traaaction, you earn your referral commission. No time limit.

q6.q: Do I need to be an active seller to refer?
q6.a: Yes, you need to have completed your seller profile on Traaaction. Your referral link is generated automatically and accessible from your dashboard, in the Referral section.

q7.q: What happens if a sale is refunded?
q7.a: If a sale is refunded, all related commissions (seller commission + referral commissions) are automatically cancelled. If they have already been paid out, a negative balance is applied.

cta.title: Ready to build your network?
cta.subtitle: Create your seller account, share your link, and start earning on every sale in your network.
cta.note: Free. No commitment. Referral link generated instantly.
